item.description: We, along with the security industry and our partners, continue to investigate the extent of the Solorigate attack. item.title: ImmutableInterlocked.Update Method (System.Collections.Immutable)
item.description: Mutates an immutable array in-place with optimistic locking transaction semantics via a specified transformation function. The transformation is retried as many times as necessary to win the optimistic locking race.
item.author: (dotnet-bot)

item.title: Bouncy Castle crypto authentication bypass vulnerability revealed
item.description: A severe authentication bypass vulnerability has been reported in Bouncy Castle, a popular open-source cryptography library. When exploited, the vulnerability (CVE-2020-28052) can allow an attacker to gain access to user and administrator accounts due to a cryptographic weakness in the manner passwords are checked.
item.author: (Ax Sharma)

item.title: How to configure Postman API tests in Azure DevOps
item.description: This post is configuring Postman API tests in Azure DevOps. Postman makes API development easy. In this post I am discussing about configuring Postman API testing in Azure DevOps and GitHub actions.
